title.label: The game is so unfair I canâ€™t win!!!!!!!!

content.label: Iâ€™m all ways getting matched up against better players and I always lose!!!

Hey, (reader)

I have played clash Royale for 8 months now, playing this game, makes me think that something is unfair about it. I have reached silver league now. I have played so many decks, to reach a higher level. The amount of easy wins you get, the higher level bot/player is got in the next round. Therefore, those high level players win easily. This deducts our trophies and crowns. Instead of this matchmaking, I would like you to kindly fix the matchmaking in the next update. Apparently, I am in level 9 and I see level 13 players by this rigged matchmaking. Next update, I would like you to do matchmaking with similar level players and of the SAME SERVER.

Yours sincerely,

My first critique is to update the 2v2 battles. I really love doing 2v2 battles because they are so fun but they become unplayable after a while because eventually you just keep losing over and over again. Also, there have been times when I did 2v2 battles and my opponent out of nowhere spawns FOUR  GOBLIN BARRELS IN A ROW HEADING FOR MY KING TOWER AND CLONES ALL OF THEM for me and my teammate to get destroyed in under a second. There were no breaks either; they just kept spawning over and over again without interruption. Please take these bots out of the game.

My second critique is to update the events. On the events where you have to get 10 wins or 3 losses, I only get 1 or 2 wins before I lose three times in a row.  I tried using every possible deck I could think of and nothing seems to work. This has happened for every event I did and itâ€™s really frustrating.

Other than that, itâ€™s a really fun game.

title.label: Itâ€™s ok yet there are way too many things wrong with this game

content.label: I used to be an avid clash Royale player but lately the games quality is just taking a huge drop. The higher arenas are dominated by super high lvls with op cards that supercell never ever nerfs (rg, rh) making it so tilting to climb as a lvl 10 to 11. It surprises me that the higher levels using royal giant and hog cycle canâ€™t get out of masters, or maybe they simply enjoy the free wins. And the community had made it clear that these cards are op, but still they never nerf. In addition, the new clan wars are super boring and donâ€™t feel fun like the old ones did, so drop in quality there too. And most importantly, this game is the biggest lay to win game Iâ€™ve ever played, in addition with all of supercells games in general. It tries to downplay how pay to win it is, but ultimately fails. You can lose to someone with no skill just because they spent 20 dollars in the game. Supercell describes this game as â€œexciting pvp actionâ€ but really the game gets so stale after awhile. Even with the new game modes, you still have to deal with the blatantly op cards as before, and it always feels the same. Overall itâ€™s a horrible game and I would not recommend it to anyone, Iâ€™m sorry I wasted so many hours of my life on this horrible game.
RUINED

This game is rigged and pay to win. First off I am in the gold arena and have been stuck in it for a very long time. I am a level 9 king tower and I am constantly getting out up against level 12 thatâ€™s not fair at all they will always win. 2nd I recently made a deck and went on a 6 win streak, then I come across a e-giant deck and lose. Then I come across 3 more e-giant decks what are those odds SUPERCELL. 3rd I was playing a couple days ago and came across the same counter deck 2x in a row the exact same deck! Again, EXPLAIN those odds. I think that they definitely have an algorithm that puts you up against a opponent with a counterdeck after you win a couple times. This will cause you to keep playing and it makes the game addicting. DONâ€™T get unless your rich!!!!!!
